section.p:
To achieve better audio effects, Agora recommends calling setAudioProfile(AUDIO_PROFILE_TYPE profile, AUDIO_SCENARIO_TYPE scenario) before using preset audio effects, and setting the profile parameter as follows:
Preset Audio Effect profile
ROOM_ACOUSTICS_VIRTUAL_STEREO, ROOM_ACOUSTICS_3D_VOICE, ROOM_ACOUSTICS_VIRTUAL_SURROUND_SOUND AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY_STEREO or AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_STANDARD_STEREO
Other preset audio effects (excluding AUDIO_EFFECT_OFF) AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY or AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY_STEREO

plentry.pd: (0x00000000): Turns off audio effects and uses the original sound.
(0x02010100): Typical audio effect for KTV scenes.
(0x02010200): Typical audio effect for concert hall scenes.
(0x02010300): Typical audio effect for studio scenes.
(0x02010400): Typical audio effect in the style of a vintage phonograph.
(0x02010500): Virtual stereo effect that renders mono audio as stereo.
(0x02010600): Audio effect that enhances spatial perception.
(0x02010700): Ethereal-style audio effect.

(0x02010800): 3D audio effect that makes the sound move around the user with a default cycle of 10 seconds. After setting this effect, you can call to modify the movement cycle. To enable this effect, you need to use stereo playback devices to achieve the expected audio effect.

(0x02010900): Virtual surround sound that simulates surround sound fields based on stereo channels to create a surround effect. To enable this effect, you need to use stereo playback devices to achieve the expected audio effect.
(0x02010D00): Chorus audio effect, suitable for chorus scenes, enhancing vocal layering and spatial perception.
(0x02020100): Voice of a middle-aged man. Agora recommends using it for processing male voices; otherwise, the expected audio effect may not be achieved.
(0x02020200): Voice of an elderly man. Agora recommends using it for processing male voices; otherwise, the expected audio effect may not be achieved.
(0x02020300): Voice of a boy. Agora recommends using it for processing male voices; otherwise, the expected audio effect may not be achieved.
(0x02020400): Voice of a young woman. Agora recommends using it for processing female voices; otherwise, the expected audio effect may not be achieved.
(0x02020500): Voice of a girl. Agora recommends using it for processing female voices; otherwise, the expected audio effect may not be achieved.
(0x02020600): Voice of Pigsy, similar to a bear roar effect.
(0x02020700): Voice of the Hulk.
(0x02030100): Typical audio effect in R&B music style.
(0x02030200): Typical audio effect in pop music style.
(0x02040100): Pitch correction effect that adjusts the user's pitch based on the natural C major scale. After setting this effect, you can call to adjust the tuning mode and tonic pitch.
